column1: Smoque BBQ////The very best BBQ in Chicago
column2: and probably one of my most favorites ever. Believe the other positive reviews because they are true. The meat quality is excellent- this is a huge part of what sets this place apart from other joints. I always get the pulled pork platter and it is always smoked perfectly
column3: and the flavors are amazing. I LOVE the peach cobbler for desert
column6: and beans are good too. There is usually a long line
column7: so I call in my order ahead of time and pick it up- it tastes just as good at home!
